Sentencas: The study presented here considers the on-board gasification of biodiesel and power generation using solid oxide fuel cells for power a railroad locomotive of the long-haul or road variety.
Titulo: Feasibility analysis for solid oxide fuel cells as a power source for railroad road locomotives

Sentencas: Equipment sizes, efficiencies, and life cycle costs under a variety of scenarios are calculated with the objective of determining the feasibility of this type of power system when compared with the standard internal combustion engine/generator power systems currently in-use.
Titulo: Feasibility analysis for solid oxide fuel cells as a power source for railroad road locomotives

Sentencas: The analysis concludes that SOFC based locomotives using on-board gasified biodiesel are technically feasible.
Titulo: Feasibility analysis for solid oxide fuel cells as a power source for railroad road locomotives

Sentencas: However, economic justification is more difficult.
Titulo: Feasibility analysis for solid oxide fuel cells as a power source for railroad road locomotives

Sentencas: While cost of fuel is the dominant overall cost of the locomotive power plant over its life cycle the efficiency of the SOFC is not high enough to offset its higher capital cost under most scenarios.
Titulo: Feasibility analysis for solid oxide fuel cells as a power source for railroad road locomotives

Sentencas: This could significantly change under regulatory standards that may dramatically increase the operating costs or capital costs of internal combustion engines for rail use in the future.
Titulo: Feasibility analysis for solid oxide fuel cells as a power source for railroad road locomotives
